statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE participant_id = 125 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE trial_result = 'Failed' AND age < 40 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE age < 18 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM participants p USING trial_results tr WHERE p.id = tr.participant_id AND tr.result = 'Failed';
DELETE FROM TrialResults WHERE timestamp < now() - interval '1' day;
DELETE FROM participants WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM trial_results WHERE result_id IN (SELECT result_id FROM trial_results WHERE result LIKE '%positive%');
